entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
